article_text: The Lincoln Journal Star welcomes readers' comments. Letters to the editor must include the writer's name, address and home and work telephone numbers. We suggest you also include your e-mail address. The editors may edit and condense letters; the suggested length limit is 200 words.

article_metadata.author: the Journal Star editorial board

og.description: Today the Journal Star makes the first of its endorsements for the May 10 primary election.
og.title: Editorial, 4/24: Endorsements for Legislature

article_metadata.description: Today the Journal Star makes the first of its endorsements for the May 10 primary election.

article_summary:
Letters to the editor must include the writer's name, address and home and work telephone numbers.
The editors may edit and condense letters; the suggested length limit is 200 words.
We suggest you also include your e-mail address.
The Lincoln Journal Star welcomes readers' comments.
